name: Hangar 30
description:
We’re a team of creatives, strategists, developers, planners, writers and implementers. We’re driven by our capabilities and agile in our approach. The unique combined talent of our team forms a rare breed of visionary insight. Based in beautiful Denver, Colorado, Hangar 30 is an industry leader in video production, web design, interactive marketing and mobile development.
We’ve planned, developed and deployed an array of successful, award-winning solutions for a variety of different clients. Some of our most notable projects include Ready54, a website that promotes Air and Army National Guard resiliency; WingmanDay.org, a once-stop-shop of resources used by Wing leadership; “The Fence”, a half-hour scripted drama series used for ANG resiliency training; and a new website and brand identity for Flonomics, an advanced analytics service for retailers. We’re a quickly-growing team of people who bring talent and creativity from all walks of life. On any given day, you’ll converse with craft beer enthusiasts, painters, cyclists, fashion deconstructors, poets, fishermen, and even a dog or two.
 
READ MORE...
